question.body: Which of these structure pairs are part of the vascular tunic?

response.feedback: Incorrect. One of these is part of the fibrous tunic.
Correct. These are both part of the vascular or middle tunic of the eye; the choroid has melanin pigment and the iris has pigment based on genetic inheritance.
Incorrect. One is part of the fibrous tunic and other is part of the neural tunic.

part.hint: As the name implies, this layer has many blood vessels and is pigmented.
